entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistency between documentation and implementation for EnumerationOptions.MaxRecursionDepth #104997
  • [API Proposal]: Break out [Uri Class (System)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.uri?view=net-7.0) query parameters as a property #104986
    Future
  • `DOTNET_PreferredVectorBitWidth` is not respected by `Vector<T>` #104978
  • [API Proposal]: SearchValues<string>.Contains(ReadOnlySpan<char> span) #104977
  • exception_handling/pal_sxs/test1/paltest_pal_sxs_test1 failure in CI #104968
  • using dotnet6.0 on win7 crash #104967
  • mono assertion failure in CI: mono_class_get_flags: unexpected GC filler class #104956
  • Optimize unboxing for nullable #104954
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions in Regex on 7/11/2024 6:16:28 PM #104975
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regressions in System.IO.Compression #104979
  • [API Proposal]: Safe nullability for `ref struct`s #104938
  • Stack Allocation Enhancements #104936
  • [6.0] Internal exception in System.Security.Cryptography.Dsa.Tests.DsaSpanSignatureFormatTests tests #104933

Closed

  • JIT: Arm64 release JitDisasm has a lot of empty comments #91719
    9.0.0
  • `RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer()` should check if generic method is constructed #101664
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: A way to change volume of a played sound with `SoundPlayer` #97926
  • Trimming: Reflection access to compiler generated methods produces warnings #85042
    9.0.0
  • [macOS] cannot debug / stop at breakpoints when app sandbox is enabled #79852
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 12/7/2023 9:32:35 PM #95926
    9.0.0
  • `RequestReJITWithInliners` doesn't always trigger a rejit without `COR_PRF_MONITOR_JIT_COMPILATION` enabled #87418
    9.0.0
  • DoStackSnapshot behaves differently on Windows x86 and x64 WRT stack unwinding #88463
    9.0.0
  • [apple][HybridGlobalization] Enable more System.Globalization.Tests for Apple Hybrid-Globalization #100240
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 9 Regressions on 7/9/2024 1:59:56 PM #104974
  • runtime-community: linux-ppc64le mono failure in BinaryFormatTests.FormatterTests.BinaryFormatterTests.ValidateAgainstBlobs - outdated stored blob #104338
  • EventPipe shutdown race condition in .net7/.net6 #89621
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledAttribute #103105
    9.0.0
  • [Android] Runtime/BCL native libs need support for devices with 16k memory pages (arm64 and x64) #103360
    Future
  • Unhandled exception on Linux ignores Dispose #79155
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: !"UnwindManagedExceptionPass1: PAL_VirtualUnwind failed" #91723
    9.0.0
  • Failed test: baseservices/exceptions/regressions/Dev11/154243/dynamicmethodliveness/dynamicmethodliveness.cmd #104924
    9.0.0
  • [6.0/8.0] Failure in BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11: no exception thrown #104390
    6.0.x
  • Strange errors in .NET SDK 7.0.105 ppc64le #86069
    Future
  • [Test Failure] Long Running Test: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_Sync.SendRecv_Stream_TCP_LargeMultiBufferSends #89440
    Future
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.StartInfo_BadExe: Values differ #104941
  • Process.Linux: handle when proc mount mismatches with pid namespace #99887
    9.0.0
  • Issue with Azerbaijani Culture in .NET 8 Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App #104717
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic is leaking UnobservedTaskExceptions #80111
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_45929/test45929/test45929.cmd #104878
    9.0.0
  • Implicit GC.KeepAlive in classes with finalizers #103522
    Future
  • Accessing constructors with UnsafeAccessor throws exception on generic types in .NET9 #104879
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use `in` on `Unsafe.AreSame` callsites #105000
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Fix a SVE issue and add CI leg for testing SVE with AltJit #104998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Fix feature switch IL when feature attributes are removed #104995
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging]: Light up support for OpenSSL ENGINEs only if they are available. #104994
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security
  • Emit More EventSource Data For Metrics Measurements #104993
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [GC] Fix freelist crash - don't modify during check-only operation #104992
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Fixes from API review approvals #104990
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • #ifdef out of the DACCESS_BUILD the GetMethodDescForSlot api #104989
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disable tests that use a flaky FSW in Windows #104988
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Fix LowerHWIntrinsicGetElement for xarch #104987
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix KeyAvailable and ReadKey() in ConsolePal.Windows. #104984
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Allow explicitly implemented ISimdVector APIs to be handled as intrinsic #104983
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [Loader][tests] Add more logging to pinpoint BinderTracingTests hang #104982
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove `GTF_IND_INVARIANT` and `GTF_IND_NONFAULTING` flags checking #104976
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • don't rely on error code returned on Windows Nano #104973
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-windows-nano, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Increasing the tolerance for Mono Runtime for the flaky ProcessThreadTests.TestStartTimeProperty test #104972
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Automate the creation of the sfx PackageOverrides.txt file #104971
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Redact query from HttpTelemetry #104970
    area-System.Net
  • fix possible locking issue in PollingWildCardChangeToken #104969
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 9.0.0
  • Console beep: perform the sys-call directly #104966
    area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • Make it possible to resolve static virtuals to unshared methods at runtime #104965
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Improve handling OOM error #104963
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • OpenSSL providers support #104961
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Support sign mismatches for small types in physical promotion #104953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in callback returns #104949
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] CLR test build fix #104946
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve the handling of SIMD comparisons #104944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] HttpClientFactory Keyed DI APIs #104943
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Use OverloadResolutionPriority with Debug/Trace.Assert(string) #104942
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #104940
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Resolve some issues impacting the jitstress-isas-x86 runs #104935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104934
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move GenTreeVecCon and GenTreeMskCon under the respective FEATURE_* defines #104932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Throw InvalidOperationException on RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer() for generic methods #104644
    area-System.Reflection, 9.0.0
  • Fix crash in DAC enum memory code that brings down createdump #104939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't warn for reflection access to compiler-generated code #104757
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • SPMI: Improve error handling in parallel mode #104907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2496344 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • SPMI: Fix a few memory leaks #104691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update-eol-versions-6.0-staging #103380
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix name of zlib that the linker needs #104904
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade the dotnet core version installed for the esrp signing task #104980
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade the dotnet core version installed for the esrp signing task #104985
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update EOL versions (8.0-staging) #103393
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Add DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptionsAttribute #104813
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Avoid duplicate hash table lookups in VN #104873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix alpine-riscv64 build #104920
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Disable armv6 in runtime-community pipeline #104951
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Android] Link native shared libraries with 16k page alignment #104577
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Disable System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests on ppc64le #104950
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Emulate shell exit code behavior for signals in PAL #104902
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Unify LSRA call arg building #104051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `ConvertToSingle`, `ConvertToDouble`; fix `CovertTo*` tests #104478
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddRotateComplex`, `MultiplyAddRotateComplex` #104926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging][browser] Fix WBT timeout (30000ms exceeded) #104947
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser
  • Reimplement LINQ ToList using SegmentedArrayBuilder to reduce allocations #104365
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Disable QUIC&HTTP/3 parallelization on tests #104948
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104838
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104837
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Fix size of dirent buffer on illumos #104448
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] fix unobserved exceptions #104894
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix EH stacktrace keepalive array copy size #104912
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #104929
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #104925
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Updated

  • Ensure `ISimdVector` default implementations perform nullcheck #104831
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Do not encode safe points with -1 offset. #104336
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • [WIP] a different way to calculation unusable frag for DATAS #104291
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add InheritServiceKeyAttribute to enable resolving the dependencies with the same key #102160
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Define equals manually for Swift JitInterface InlineArray types. #104843
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Qualify the well-known IntPtr SpecialTypeInfo instance #104758
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • cDac work necessary to get the MethodTableName #104759
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add the new Lock type to Concurrent Dicionary #104575
    area-System.Collections
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • fix broken Select with error list on macOS #104915
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • NativeAOT/win/arm64: Fix the reloc type typo #104516
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Introduce IBufferedLogger #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Optimize BOX+UNBOX for "T? -> T" and "T -> T?" #104931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix superpmi collect failure for crossgen2 on linux x64 and windows x86 #104181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Begin adding MethodDesc APIs to the RuntimeTypeSystem contract #104811
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Value num refine phis #104752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, use more precise way to figure how much to pop. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix SSP restoring in edge cases #104820
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Revert "[wasm] Intrinsics for blazor" #103774
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104829
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104828
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Expose the Sin, Cos, and SinCos methods on the Vector types #104848
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable embedding install location options in apphost #104749
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Mono] Fix the race condition issue of aot_module loading #104918
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.x
  • [mono][infra] Remove Mono LLVMJIT builds #104552
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755

    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Jul 10 #2632

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow pinning Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref version #42199
  • Make RuntimeFrameworkVersion apply to targeting packs #42196
    10.0.1xx
  • Publish all .dll dependencies to a separate /lib or /bin directory (dotnet publish) #42191
  • Project source of warnings not immediately obvious when building a solution #42190
  • NET SDK tool install repetition fails if folder was copied via Docker on Windows #42182
  • For Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk projects it should be possible to configure packages installs to use npm ci rather than npm install #42171
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 p7 zip installed, the prompt message "update are available for the..." should not be displayed after installing wasm-tools. #42170

Closed

  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.200] dotnet tool install command get access deny message #38354
  • dotnet tool restore results in FileNotFoundException on linux due to case sensitivity issue #41844
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9 preview 7 sdk installed, Running winforms/wpf failed in CLI. #42012

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete trn, not tmp, in cleaning up #42201
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support to generate SBRP usage report #42200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard Installer EndToEnd tests to Helix #42195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix RestoreCommand filename #42175
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automated test to verify that the custom culture is respected #42174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix scoped CSS hot reload #42137
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Make dotnet help understand subcommands #42161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix CodeOwners file #42127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update scancode to 32.2.1 #42079
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove dead version properties and unnecessary package refs #42109
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Attempt to fix Publish60Hosted_Works test #42061
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update .editorconfig template with new defaults #42059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] update warning message for containers package inclusion #40628
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add source.dot.net stage 1 asset publication #42132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Android workload manifests to SB .NET SDK #42125
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24365.1 #42156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: `field` keyword in properties #140
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: First-Class Span Types #7905
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Extending patterns to "as" #8210
  • Champion "Const Var" #106
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix lists in an LDM note #8295
  • Remove ldm history from the speclet #8292
  • fix anchor text #8290

Merged

  • Update LDM-2024-07-15-usage-data.md #8294
  • `field` as keyword in primary expression only #8283
  • Update first-class Span open question about extension receiver break #8287

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • error RZ3600: Invalid value ''' for RazorLangVersion. Valid values include 'Latest' or a valid version in range 1 .0 to 8.0 #74410
  • MSBuildWorkspace should have unit tests running on mono #74407
    Backlog
  • Generic extension method on generic type with `LangVersion=preview` and `Nullable=enable` crashes compiler with `NullReferenceException` in `ConstraintsHelper.CheckConstraints` when accessing non-existent member of extension method's name on type #74404
  • Name of ```AllowedRequiredModifierType.System_Runtime_CompilerServices_OutAttribute``` implies wrong location of the ```OutAttribute``` type #74403

Closed

  • Consider testing scenario similar to the one in `UnscopedRef_02` without params #73557
    17.11
  • Consider testing scenario similar to one in `MissingScopedInOverride_01`, but with implicitly scoped parameter #73555
    17.11
  • Consider testing ERR_ScopedMismatchInParameterOfPartial and ERR_ScopedMismatchInParameterOfTarget when ref like type parameters are involved #73554
    17.11
  • Bug: Conditional Operator stores ref result in a non-ref-temporary (Only when SpillSequenceSpiller is used - e.g. for async/await) #74115
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35115.160 #74399

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in AnalyzerFileReference.GetAnalyzerTypeNameMap #74411
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Remove assembly loading light-up from scripting #74409
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Remove diagnostic for 'value' as a contextual keyword #74408
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge 'main' into features/FirstClassSpan #74406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Use modreq to prevent consumption of instance extensions from other compilers #74405
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Restore removed API #74400
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Convert ImplementTypeOptions to editorconfig options #74376
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve span conversion tests #74387
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Revert "Extensions: Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field (#73407)" #74346
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Additional tests for `ref struct interfaces` feature #74282
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • SpillSequenceSpiller – preserve `ref` BoundConditionalOperator in presence of spilling in its either branch #74310

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor hybrid navigation failed #56838
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #56836
  • Perf improvement: json, json #56835
  • Cannot use AddJwtBearer with alternate scheme name #56834
  • IBrowserFile Binding Converter Error #56832
  • Warning AD0001 : Analyzer 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Analyzers.RouteHandlers.RouteHandlerAnalyzer' NullReferenceException due to generics in minimal API #56831
  • Investigate and polish perf in OpenAPI pipeline #56829
  • Failures in Mvc.Template Tests #56828
  • Blazor WASM doesn't load loc resources unless the current culture and current UI culture are the same #56824
    .NET 10 Planning
  • .NET 8 Blazor "No authenticationScheme was specified, and there was no DefaultChallengeScheme found" on Authorize Attribute after updating from .NET6 #56820
  • Reenable SYSLIB0057 and fix the obsolete X509Certificate2 ctor usages #56817
  • HealthCheck forcefully logs error on HealthCheckResult.Unhealthy #56815
  • Uncaught Error: No interop methods are registered for renderer 1 #56813

Closed

  • Add support for an interface for OpenAPI operation transformations #56022
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56808
  • Perf improvement: single_query #56785
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #56807
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #56812
  • `IEmailSender` does not exist in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI when targeting .NET 7 #56823
  • ApiDescriptionProvider does not return SupportedResponseTypes when using controllers with Results<T> #56763
  • As sourcelink has removed,so we can not browse or debug asp.net core source ? #56819
  • Update dotnet-sql-cache to .NET 8 #56816
  • Navigate to incorrect URL when launch the .NET 9.0 Web API project with IIS Express. #56740

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Prepend ? when dealing with runtime query string prefixes #56837

Merged

  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395

    area-mvc, 9.0-preview7
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #56803
    area-mvc
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm package cache 2024-07-15 #56802
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Apply schema transformers on properties and other subschemas #56709
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add generic variants of ProducesProblem and ProducesValidationProblem #56810
    area-web-frameworks
  • mark verified files as lf and utf8 #56643

  • Fix ProjectTemplate build steps with new JDK #56199

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When resizing the application window in Windows, if the resizing is done horizontally then elements within the window will resize correctly, but if resizing is done only vertically then resizing does not occur. #23641
  • [iOS] Image on Button doesn't properly centered when setting ContentLayout to Top and text has 2 or more lines. #23635

  • Drag & Drop using GestureRecognizers fails on Mac Catalyst #23627

  • WebAuthenticator freezes in case when system kills app process #23622
  • 'OnPropertyChanged("Item") ' invalid in 'Release' mode #23621

Merged

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, community ✨

    area-infrastructure

    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview

Updated

  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨

  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343

    tell-mode
